meta.name: For Jill — A Curated Collection of Vessels
meta.subtitle: A Curated Collection of Coffee Mugs for Jill
meta.tagline: The simple act of sipping, elevated.
meta.hero_quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
meta.footer_message: Crafted with care, chosen for you.

products.name: Kennedy for President Campaign Mug
products.description: A tangible piece of American political history. This mug, emblazoned with the youthful promise of JFK, represents a time of hope and change. Imagine the conversations it held, the dreams it fueled, over countless cups of coffee.
products.expected_content: A vintage white ceramic mug with 'Kennedy for President' printed on it, showing wear consistent with age.

products.name: Coupe Mug
products.description: The simple, elegant form of Heath Ceramics is a testament to enduring design. Hold this mug and feel the connection to California's modernist legacy, a warm embrace in your hands each morning.
products.expected_content: A Heath Ceramics Coupe Mug in a solid glaze color, showcasing its simple, rounded form.

products.name: Teema Mug
products.description: Kaj Franck's Teema embodies the essence of Scandinavian design: functional, beautiful, and timeless. The pure, unadorned form invites quiet contemplation with every sip.
products.expected_content: A simple, cylindrical Iittala Teema mug in a solid color.

products.name: The Mug
products.description: Handmade in Asheville, North Carolina, each East Fork mug is a celebration of imperfection. The unique glaze variations and sturdy form offer a comforting start to the day.
products.expected_content: An East Fork 'The Mug' with visible glaze variations and a substantial handle.

products.name: Hasami Porcelain Mug
products.description: Inspired by traditional Japanese stacking boxes, Hasami Porcelain combines minimalist form with functional design. Its understated elegance brings a touch of serenity to your coffee ritual.
products.expected_content: A simple, unglazed Hasami Porcelain mug with clean lines and a slightly textured surface.

products.name: Korean Celadon Glaze Mug
products.description: Ethereal and serene, this celadon mug reflects centuries of Korean ceramic artistry. The subtle crackle glaze and delicate form transform your daily coffee into a moment of mindful appreciation.
products.expected_content: A Korean celadon mug with a subtle green glaze and delicate crackle pattern.

products.name: Fire-King Jadeite D-Handle Mug
products.description: A nostalgic icon of mid-century Americana. The soft green hue and sturdy form of this Fire-King mug evoke a sense of warmth and familiarity, like a comforting memory from a bygone era.
products.expected_content: A green Fire-King Jadeite D-Handle mug in good vintage condition.

products.name: Arabia Finland Krokus Mug
products.description: Esteri Tomula's Krokus pattern brings a touch of whimsical charm to the table. This vintage Arabia Finland mug is a testament to enduring Scandinavian design, a joyful way to start the day.
products.expected_content: An Arabia Finland Krokus mug with the black and white floral pattern designed by Esteri Tomula.
